description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in Windows Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) identified by CVE-2024-30009:

1. Download and install the relevant updates from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system corresponds to one of the following build numbers when applying the fix:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3593
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19045.4412

**Details**:
- The updates that need to be applied are KB-5037788, KB-5037771, KB-5037770, and KB-5037768.
- These updates mitigate the risk associated with the vulnerability, preventing potential remote code execution attacks.
- For additional information or manual installation, visit the following links:
  - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the specified versions mentioned before proceeding with the update.
- Backup data before applying system patches to avoid any loss of information.
